title: The Cigar Industry Graveyard
itunes:title: The Cigar Industry Graveyard
description:
This week on The Cigar Authority broadcasting live from the Toscano Sound Stage in Salem, New Hampshire... The cigar industry graveyard. Where cigars go to die - and the brands that has happened too. It’s the Ugly truth and we have it for you!  Special guest William Cooper a.k.a. Cigar Coop will be joining us.

We will fire up a cigar from The Cigar Authority care package in the first hour; Studio 21 #4 Churchill.  In the second hour we will fire up the United Cigar/Foundation Cigar collaboration; Wiseman Maduro Firecracker. 

Join us for all of this and the usual suspects including the VS Question of the Week, Offer of the Day, Ask the Don, the Email of the Week and a peek into the Asylum.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH.
